content: gem bag holder bag we had been storing our plastic bags for recycling in another plastic bag hanging inside of our pantry it s gotten so full at times that in order to close the door we had to shove the bag to the inside and quickly shut the door so that was kind of a pain not to mention a little unsightly i know we ve all seen these storage bag holders at craft shows but i wanted one now - so what better way to utilize a skill set this is a simple pattern that works up quickly and can be done in a single color or multi colors with stash yarn already on hand those of you that do craft fairs this may be an item that you could make and sell while helping to promote recycling my testers and i used worsted weight acrylic yarn with hooks ranging from 4 5-5 5mm the results are relatively the same i hope you like it chain 24 slip_stitch in 1st chain to make a ring r1- ch1 single_crochet in same space single_crochet in each chain around slip_stitch join to 1st single_crochet 24 single_crochet r2- ch3 1st double_crochet double_crochet in same stitch double_crochet in next single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet then double_crochet in next single_crochet 11 times slip_stitch to top of ch3 36 double_crochet r3- ch3 1st double_crochet double_crochet in same stitch double_crochet in each of next 2 stitches 2dc in next stitch one double_crochet in each of next 2 stitches 11 times slip_stitch to top of ch3 48 double_crochet r4- ch2 1st half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in each stitch around 48 half_double_crochet r5- ch3 1st double_crochet double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to top of ch3 48 double_crochet r6- ch3 1st double_crochet double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to top of ch3 48 double_crochet r7- ch1 single_crochet in same stitch ch5 skip 2 stitches single_crochet in next stitch 16 times omitting the single_crochet in the last repeat slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r8- slip_stitch to center of ch5sp single_crochet ch5 single_crochet in next ch5sp around omitting the single_crochet in the last repeat slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r9- slip_stitch to center of ch5sp single_crochet ch5 single_crochet in next ch5sp around omitting the single_crochet in the last repeat slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r10- slip_stitch to center of ch5sp single_crochet ch5 single_crochet in next ch5sp around omitting the single_crochet in the last repeat slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r11- slip_stitch to ch5sp ch3 1st double_crochet 2dc in same ch5sp 3dc in each ch5sp slip_stitch to top of ch3 48 double_crochet r12- repeat r5 48 double_crochet r13- repeat r5 48 double_crochet r14- repeat r5 48 double_crochet if you d like to increase the length of the bag you can simply repeat r5 here as many times as you like r15- repeat r7 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r16- repeat r8 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet r17- repeat r9 16 ch5sp 16 single_crochet
